ingredients.ingredient: 1 Â½ cups prepared Thai peanut sauce

cookingTips: Cook rice vermicelli just until al dente as it can overcook quickly and become mushy
Toss noodles with a small amount of oil immediately after draining to prevent sticking
Warm shrimp gently with the sauce to avoid toughening them; they're already cooked
enrichment.coachingPrompt: How do you combine delicate cooked shrimp and rice noodles with peanut sauce without them becoming clumpy or overcooked?
